titles.title: White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
To redesignate the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in the State of North Dakota as the White Horse Hill National Game Preserve.
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
White Horse Hill National Game Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the Sullys Hill National Game Preserve in North Dakota as the "White Horse Hill National Game Preserve."
